column5: Anyone know of a good contact to do quality baseboard trim work? Need 2 rooms to be done, one is 22x13 and the other is 9x9. Located in Stoney Creek. Thanks in advance.
PM SaltyDawg(Don), he is sposed to be an excellent carpenter and finisher.   Paul

My brother Will lives in Hamilton and does really nice carpentry work... he is pretty booked up, but you could try him anyways... let him know that his brother Pete referred you from the OFC fishing site.  Will (Hoffmann Construction) 416-896-8916
And im looking for a boat.. bring on the work.
Don is good... I have worked with him.. If he is not available I am.  Just up the road from you.  G
I am licensed carpenter and do nice work, if you are still looking send me a pm
